column4: i feel stupid. how do i burn a cd using nautilus? i've got the files copy/pasted in the "Blank-CDR disc / CD creator" folder nautilus gave me when i inserted a blank disk
right click the iso and select burn
or, if it's a series of files, press ctrl+l in nautilus and type burn:
IdleOne: thanks for the tips. i've created the iso and am now burning it with gnomebaker
